sentences.en: An anxious or depressed person can experience a really bad trip.
sentences.cn: 焦虑或抑郁的人吸毒后可能会有非常糟糕的幻觉。

sentences.en: Do you feel anxious when unforeseen incidents intrude on your day?
sentences.cn: 当意外事件干扰了你的生活时，你会感到焦虑吗？

sentences.en: He seemed most anxious to speak to me alone.
sentences.cn: 他似乎迫切地想同我单独谈谈。

sentences.en: I believe he is most painfully anxious about Diana.
sentences.cn: 我相信他肯定非常担心黛安娜。

sentences.en: I was anxious to get him here, away from family and friends.
sentences.cn: 我急于把他带到这儿，远离家人和朋友。

sentences.en: Lloyd George was most anxious to be agreeable and pleasant.
sentences.cn: 劳埃德·乔治极力想表现得平易近人、和蔼亲切。

sentences.en: Men are anxious to improve their circumstances, but are unwilling to improve themselves; they therefore remain bound.--James Allen
sentences.cn: 人们总是渴望改善周遭环境，但是却不愿意改善自己，因此总停留在原地，无法进步。

sentences.en: Mitsubishi Motors were anxious to get a toehold in the European market.
sentences.cn: 三菱汽车急于在欧洲市场上取得初步的立足之地。

sentences.en: Prices have been cut by developers anxious to offload unsold apartments.
sentences.cn: 急于脱手未售出公寓的开发商降低了房价。

sentences.en: She gave me an anxious look.
She was anxious not to appear clinging.
sentences.cn: 她竭力不让自己看上去显得过分依恋别人。

sentences.en: Some sedatives produce the para-doxical effect of making the person more anxious.
sentences.cn: 一些镇静剂适得其反，加重了患者的焦虑。

sentences.en: The subject peoples of her empire were anxious for their own independence.
sentences.cn: 她的帝国中被迫向她臣服的民族迫切渴望自身的独立。

sentences.en: Then a memory stirs in you and you start feeling anxious.
sentences.cn: 接着一段回忆涌上心头，你开始感到焦虑不安。

sentences.en: They are anxious to show their abhorrence of racism.
sentences.cn: 他们急切地想要表明自己对种族主义的憎恨。

sentences.en: They hurried about in dead silence, with anxious faces.
sentences.cn: 他们匆匆地走来走去，一言不发，面露焦急之色。

sentences.en: They were anxious to bring the washing in before it rained.
sentences.cn: 他们急于在下雨前把洗好的衣服收进屋子。

trans.tran_cn: 焦虑的，担心的，紧张的，渴望的
